link.synopsis: Brothers Angel (Miguel Castro) and Carlos (Richard Azurdia) leave their Mexican hometown -- and their futures at dad's bakery -- to pursue the American Dream in this satirical road comedy about the perils of immigration. But when a coyote double-crosses the duo, Angel and Carlos end up on a hallucinatory adventure through the unforgiving desert and eventually find themselves working as day laborers in Tucson, Ariz.
link.title: synopsis
How the Garcia Girls Spent Their Summer
The Original Latin Kings of Comedy
Paul Rodriguez's Latin All-Stars of Comedy: Vol. 1
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys

link.synopsis: Taking center stage in his own stand-up show, funnyman Rich Vos unleashes the unique brand of humor that earned him the nickname "the Don" on the reality-based "Last Comic Standing." After making his way to the finals on the show, Vos went on to entertain audiences all over the world, making history as the first white comedian to appear on HBO's "Def Comedy Jam," among other accomplishments.
link.title: synopsis
Aisha Tyler Is Lit: Live at the Fillmore
Dom Irrera: Is This Thing On?
National Lampoon Live: New Faces: Vol. 1
White Boyz in the Hood: Season 1
Comic Relief: The Greatest... And the Latest

Guy Torry's Phat Comedy Tuesdays: Vol. 1

Dave Chappelle: For What It's Worth

Carlos Mencia: No Strings Attached: Live, Extended and Uncensored
Platinum Comedy Series: The Good, The Badd, The Funny
Vince Vaughn's Wild West Comedy Show
The Big Black Comedy Show: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: A neighborhood game of King Arthur and the Round Table becomes real in this family comedy. Eleven-year-old Alex Cole (Johnny Morina) tells his friends about the Camelot legend, and they have a blast with their aluminum foil swords and plastic armor. But when Alex stumbles across the real deal -- King Arthur's ancient sword, Excalibur -- he'll need the help of legendary sorcerer Merlin to prove himself worthy of the wondrous weapon.
link.title: synopsis
A Kid in King Arthur's Court
The Mystical Adventures of Billy Owens
A Place Called Okavango: More Adventures
Rin Tin Tin: The Lone Defender
The Prince & Me 4: The Elephant Adventure
Garfield and Friends: A Cat and His Nerd
Dinotopia: Quest for the Ruby Sunstone
Josh Kirby, Time Warrior: Trapped on Toy World
Josh Kirby, Time Warrior: Human Pets
Josh Kirby, Time Warrior: Planet of the Dino Knights
T-Rex: Back to the Cretaceous: IMAX

link.synopsis: This Indian comedy features four small-time crooks testing their hand at abducting a millionaire's daughter for quick cash, only to have their plan turned comically chaotic. The bungling kidnappers try to keep their scheme under wraps as they wait for the hostage's father to return from abroad, as well as deal with an onslaught of visiting friends and relatives. The film is lighter fare than usual from famed Bollywood producer Ram Gopal Varma.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: DJ Jordan knows that the songs he's playing stink, but as long as his boss is calling the shots, he's stuck. Fortunately, there's a sexy spinner in his office who wants to help him get the good stuff out on the airwaves. But when sparks fly, things get hotter than expected. John Witherspoon, Deon Richmond, Marcus Chong and Ajai Richards co-star in this urban romantic comedy set inside Da Station.
link.title: synopsis
Mahalia Jackson: The Power and the Glory
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
I Think I Love My Wife
Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself

link.synopsis: Enter a world of swinging sexuality with this duo of erotic tales. In Pierre Unia's French comedy Baby Cat, an amorous photographer relentlessly pursues a model, despite her repeated rejections. In Ray Marsh's Mad Mad Moviemakers, a couple of producers fund their porn movie, a spoof of the film Deep Throat, by telling friends it's a religious film. Little did they expect, their movie becomes a sleeper hit!
link.title: synopsis
The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
The Sex Adventures of the Three Musketeers

title.regular: The Sins of Showbiz: Baby Cat / The Mad Mad Moviemakers

link.synopsis: In this spoof of classic 1980s flicks such as Pretty in Pink and Footloose, the Gunderson kids -- Charlie (Mikey Day), Lori (Dominique Swain) and Max (Trevor Heins) -- relocate to a new school in a new town and struggle with stereotypes and bad clichés on the first day of class. Featuring the directorial debut of Neal Brennan ("Chappelle's Show"), this comedy will take you back to the bad fashion, big hair and bodacious lingo of the '80s.
link.title: synopsis
Platinum Comedy Series: Tracy Morgan: Life, Love & Lust
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Tracy Morgan
Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
Scout's Honor: Badge to the Bone
Film Crew: Wild Women of Wongo

link.synopsis: Comedian Louie Anderson serves up hilarious commentary about his oddball family and wacky childhood memories in this hourlong stand-up performance. Anderson's gut-busting jokes take aim at his redneck father, gabby mother, whiny younger brother and life's little absurdities, keeping the audience in stitches throughout the show. Comedy Central named the portly funnyman one of the 100 Greatest Stand-Up Comedians of All Time.
link.title: synopsis
John Pinette: I Say Nay Nay
Rita Rudner: Live from Las Vegas
Sinbad: Son of a Preacher Man
Frank Caliendo: All Over the Place
Suzanne Westenhoefer: A Bottom on Top

Andrew Dice Clay: One Night with Dice
Jamie Foxx: Straight from the Foxxhole

title.regular: Louie Anderson: Mom! Louie's Looking at Me Again!

link.synopsis: This unique documentary pulls back the curtain on the competitive world of stand-up comedy, following the careers of six budding comics as they set out to fulfill the dream of becoming the Next Big Thing. Shot over an 18-month period, from Los Angeles to Montreal, the film chronicles the ups and downs of Laurie Elliott, Nikki Payne, Dave Martin and others as they go from killing the audience on one night to dying on stage the next.
link.title: synopsis
Anita Renfroe: It's Probably Just My Thyroid
An Ideal Husband / Lady Windermere's Fan
Jamie Kennedy: Unwashed: The Stand-Up Special
Carlos Mencia: No Strings Attached: Live, Extended and Uncensored
Vince Vaughn's Wild West Comedy Show
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden

Dave Chappelle: For What It's Worth

Aisha Tyler Is Lit: Live at the Fillmore
The Big Black Comedy Show: Vol. 1
Just for Laughs: Stand-Up: Over the Edge
Patton Oswalt: My Weakness Is Strong
Charlie Murphy: I Will Not Apologize
Leslie Jordan: My Trip Down the Pink Carpet: Live in Atlanta
Denis Leary and Friends Present: Douchebags & Donuts
Tess: Looking for My Next Ex-Husband
Live from the Laugh Factory: Vol. 1
Platinum Comedy Series: Earthquake: About Got Damm Time!

link.synopsis: Written from a man's point of view, this unapologetic look at romantic angst stars Joseph Lyle Taylor as Jim Verdi, a guy who can't stay in a relationship with a woman longer than six months. Jim's soulful struggle to overcome what he calls Romantic Attention Deficit Disorder (RADD) offers a fresh, decidedly male take on the typical romantic comedy. Directed by Vincent Rubino, this indie hit was a film festival favorite.
link.title: synopsis
Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
Great Artists Two with Tim Marlow
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date

link.synopsis: Fearing that her career will go from pop diva to porn star, a spoiled singer must do everything she can to retrieve the homemade sex tape she accidentally returned to a local video store. But standing between her and the scandalous videotape is a stubborn store clerk who refuses to hand it over and takes perverse delight in making her squirm. David Cormican and Rachel Sehl star in this fresh, independent comedy from Anesty and Spiros Carasoulos.
link.title: synopsis
Scout's Honor: Badge to the Bone
A Love Song for Bobby Long

link.synopsis: Down on their luck, buddies Jamal (William L. Johnson) and Kenny (Benjamin Stephens) decide that the only way they can pluck themselves out of poverty during the summer is to sell oranges from a local kiosk. The new venture seems to be the perfect solution to their financial woes except for one tiny problem: It's hard to keep your mind on business when you're surrounded by beautiful babes. Trey Haley directs this fresh, freewheeling comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
Harold and Kumar Go to White Castle
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry

link.synopsis: This very dark comedy follows the path of two unfortunate transients and a hideously noxious adult beverage known as Viper. The homeless gents soon find that the libation, sold to them for a buck by the owner of a local liquor store, actually melts the body of those who drink the toxic brew. If they want to avoid certain death, homeless brothers Fred (Mike Lackey) and Kevin (Marc Sferrazza) will have to resist the temptation to imbibe.
link.title: synopsis
Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood

link.synopsis: The life of Ajay Sharma (Amol Palekar) becomes complicated when his brother-in-law (Deven Verma) tries to add some spice to Ajay's marriage because his wife (Parveen Babi) thinks he's no longer attracted to her. Instead, the well-intentioned meddling leads Ajay into an affair with his secretary, Anita (Deepti Naval), and causes Ajay's spouse to have a fling with Anita's beau (Farooq Shaikh) in this effervescent comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: When Leonid suspects that his wife has had an affair, he fakes a heart attack just to get her to confess. When she admits to a tryst some 30 years ago, Leonid sets off for Russia to hunt down his wife's seducer. What commences is a comedic romp through a modern-day Russia vastly different than the one he remembers. Leonid Kanevsky and Levana Finkelstein star in this Israeli comedy written and directed by Aleksandr Shabatayev.
link.title: synopsis
Turn Left at the End of the World
Hitler's Museum: The Secret History of Art Theft During World War II

link.synopsis: Hoping to break into showbiz, aspiring actors Holly and Calvin move from Iowa to New York. When Holly's aunt dies unexpectedly, the two scheme to keep her rent-controlled apartment -- without the landlord wising up. Starring Melissa Joan Hart ("Sabrina, the Teenage Witch"), Ryan Browning and Carmen Electra, this lighthearted comedy follows the high jinks of the young couple as they struggle to find their way in the Big Apple.
link.title: synopsis
A Nightmare Come True / Two Came Back
Art of Belly Dance for Beginners: Arabian Sands with Paulina
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
Meet the Spartans: Unrated Pit of Death Edition

link.synopsis: Maggie Q and Terence Yin co-star in this unconventional romantic comedy about two warring housemates who finally have something in common when one of them gets scared nearly to death. After suspecting that his attractive new roommate (Q) is trying to scam him out of his security deposit, Shito (Yin) launches a full-fledged attack for revenge. But when his trickery proves too terrorizing for her, he must nurse her back to health.
link.title: synopsis
Love Is a Many Stupid Thing
The Legend of the Shadowless Sword
Space Race: Era of the Space Shuttle: Vol. 2
Raped By an Angel 2:The Uniform Fan

link.synopsis: Screen legend Cary Grant sizzles opposite leading lady Joan Bennett in this classic romantic comedy. Although reporter Charlie Mason (Grant) loves his girlfriend, Monica (Bennett), his new post as the newspaper's city editor drives a wedge between them. When his obsession with his job drives Monica into the arms of another man (Conrad Nagel), only one question remains: What kind of wedding present should Charlie buy for the happy couple?
link.title: synopsis
Wings in the Dark / Big Brown Eyes
Thirty Day Princess / Kiss and Make Up
Irene Dunne Romance Classics: Love Affair / Penny Serenade
The Doctor Takes a Wife / A Night to Remember
The Rise of Catherine the Great
Here Comes Cookie / Love in Bloom / Six of a Kind: Triple Feature
That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News
I Met Him in Paris / Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
Rhythm on the Range / Rhythm on the River: Double Feature

link.synopsis: A host of future stars shine in the early years of this sidesplitting Canadian sketch comedy series, which later became a hit in the United States. The compilation includes 15 classic episodes that aired between 1978 and 1980. Join the blowhard owner of the fictitious Second City Television Network, Guy Cabellaro (Joe Flaherty), his wacky assistant (Andrea Martin), and the rest of the gang -- including Eugene Levy, John Candy and Catherine O'Hara.
link.title: synopsis
SCTV: Best of the Early Years: Disc 1
SCTV: Best of the Early Years: Disc 2
SCTV: Best of the Early Years: Disc 3
The Kids in the Hall: The Pilot Episode
The Hudson Brothers Razzle Dazzle Show: The Complete Series
Peter Cook & Dudley Moore: The Best of... What's Left of... Not Only... But Also...
Nardwuar: The Human Serviette: Welcome to My Castle
The Dick Cavett Show: Comic Legends
Comedy Gold: The Hilarious Story of Canadian Comedy
Mr. Sardonicus / The Old Dark House
The Best of the David Steinberg Show
Abbott and Costello Funniest Routines: Vol. 2
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Cheri Oteri

Saturday Night Live: The Best of Gilda Radner

The Best of the Flip Wilson Show
The Best of Not the 9 O'Clock News

title.regular: SCTV: Best of the Early Years
title.short: SCTV: Best of the Early Years

link.synopsis: Octogenarian grandmother Emilia (Graciana Chironi) squeezes her extended family into a dilapidated motor home for a cross-country road trip teeming with domestic discord in this episodic Argentinian comedy. As they travel toward the Brazilian border to attend a wedding, relationships blossom and fall apart, old feuds reignite, and other thorny issues crop up in the camper's stifling close quarters. Liliana Capurro and Federico Esquerro also star.
link.title: synopsis
What Have I Done to Deserve This?

link.synopsis: Filmed in 2006 at the Teatro Carlo Felice in Genoa, Italy, this production of Gaetano Donizetti's operatic comedy follows the lovely Marie (Patrizia Ciofi), a young woman bound to the Napoleonic army since birth. Smitten by the beautiful Marie, Swiss lad Tonio (Juan Diego Florez) enlists in order to preserve their love affair -- but she's beckoned by the marquis as an heir and must abandon Tonio and the regiment. Riccardo Frizza conducts.
link.title: synopsis
Daniel Barenboim: Wagner: Tristan und Isolde
Turandot: At the Forbidden City of Beijing
Tchaikovsky: Eugene Onegin: The Metropolitan Opera
Natalie Dessay: Greatest Moments on Stage
Luciano Pavarotti: Verdi: Un Ballo in Maschera
Georges Bizet: Les Pecheurs De Perles
Anna Netrebko: Mozart: Le Nozze di Figaro
Cook, Dixon & Young: In Concert: Vol. 1
La Traviata: Love & Sacrifice: The Story of the Opera
Opera Australia: Celebration: 40 Years Of Australian Opera

link.synopsis: Relaxed and easygoing singing sensation Andy Williams performs 10 of the most popular songs of all time and joins legends such as Jerry Lewis, Paul Lynde and Jonathan Winters for a series of comedy skits. Fans of the easy-listening vocalist from the 1950s and '60s will delight in the performances by Williams, who hosted his own television variety show in 1959, as well as a series of legendary one-hour music specials.
link.title: synopsis
Andy Williams in Concert at Branson
The Pat Paulsen Half a Comedy Hour
Conquest of the Normans / The Mercenaries
Olivia Newton-John & the Sydney Symphony: Live at the Sydney Opera House
The Ascent of Money: The Financial History of the World
Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour: The Best of Season 3
An Evening with Andy Williams: Live from the Royal Albert Hall
A Little Bit of Irish: Bing Crosby in Dublin
On the Road With Duke Ellington
Jazz Icons: Thelonious Monk: Live in '66
Jazz Icons: Wes Montgomery: Live in '65
Live and Swingin': The Ultimate Rat Pack Collection
Petula Clark: Portrait of Petula Clark
Jazz Icons: Dave Brubeck: Live in '64 & '66
Duke Ellington: Live at Tivoli Gardens: Parts 1 and 2

link.synopsis: So what if her dad brought us "Charlie's Angels" and the family home is a modern-day Versailles? Tori Spelling just wants what we all do -- love and respect -- or at least that's the premise of this reality-based sitcom. Playing an exaggerated version of herself, Spelling tries to make it on her own merits in the town her father owned. Loni Anderson co-stars as Spelling's self-absorbed mother in this charmingly self-deprecating comedy.
link.title: synopsis
So noTORIous: The Complete Series: Disc 1
So noTORIous: The Complete Series: Disc 2
Kathy Griffin: My Life on the D-List
The Real Housewives of Orange County
Life of Ryan: The Complete Series
10 Things I Hate About You: Vol. 1
The Real Housewives of New Jersey
Britney and Kevin: Chaotic: The DVD
The New Adventures of Old Christine
Everybody Loves Raymond: The Series Finale
Andy Barker P.I.: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: In this campy slasher flick, Agent 999 (Norman Chu) is on assignment in a rural village when he happens upon a tribe of cannibals and must use his mastery of kung fu to fend off the hungry hordes of flesh- eating peasants. Dark comedy and plenty of gore ensue when the special agent and a motley crew of heroes, including 999's former ruthless foe, make it their mission to take down the cursed village's chief.
link.title: synopsis
Odd Couple / Breakout from Oppression / Revenge of the Patriots / Two Graves to Kung Fu
Gaumont Treasures: The Films of Leonce Perret

link.synopsis: Four Hollywood stars eager to try their hand at a new medium made up the rotating cast of this 1950s television series, which they also created. Dick Powell, David Niven, Charles Boyer and Ida Lupino star in 10 unique episodes that range from comedy to drama and feature fellow Hollywood luminaries Merle Oberon, Joanne Woodward, Natalie Wood, Joan Fontaine and others in guest appearances.
link.title: synopsis
The Golden Age of TV Drama
Groucho Marx: You Bet Your Life: The Lost Episodes
Beat the Devil / That Uncertain Feeling
Irene Dunne Romance Classics: Love Affair / Penny Serenade
The Best of the Abbott and Costello Comedy Hour
The Best of the Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet

link.synopsis: A classic animated series from the 1970s, "Groovie Goolies" captured the hearts of kids around the world with catchy tunes, haunted high jinks and slapstick comedy that parodied the Universal movie monsters. In this collection of episodes, a hilariously horrifying cast of hip ghouls -- including Frankie, Wolfie, Mummy, Drac, Boneapart, Hagatha, Bella LaGhostley, Broomhilda and Hauntleroy -- gets caught up in a slew of goofy scenarios.
link.title: synopsis
Groovie Goolies: The Saturday "Mourning" Collection: Disc 1
Groovie Goolies: The Saturday "Mourning" Collection: Disc 2
Groovie Goolies: The Saturday "Mourning" Collection: Disc 3

Challenge of the Super Friends: United They Stand

title.regular: Groovie Goolies: The Saturday Mourning Collection

link.synopsis: Shreeman Funtoosh is having a bad week, to say the least. First, a run-in with a scientist's invention turns him into an iron man. Then, as the scientist tries to cure him, a mishap turns him into a shrinking man. All this, and the only thing Shreeman wants to do is get back to normal so that he can be with his beloved Meena. Kishore Kumar, Kumkum, Anoop Kumar, Jeevankala and S.K. Shyam co-star in this entertaining blend of sci-fi and comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Death Note II: The Last Name

link.synopsis: Revisit the lazy bunch of bums led by El Borras (Guillermo Rivas) as they avoid work at all costs in this classic collection of 10 episodes from the popular Mexican comedy series. Created by Mauricio Kleiff, the writer of "El Show de los Polivoces," and starring Leonorilda Ochoa, Amparo Arozamena and Sergio "El Comanche" Ramos, "Los Beverly de Peralvillo" was a perennial fan favorite during the late 1960s and early '70s.
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Arriba las Mujeres
The Hittites: A Civilization That Changed the World
Once Upon a Time in the West
The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie

link.synopsis: A fresh and fun musical comedy, this Iranian smash hit tells a tale of mistaken identity. Los Angeles hip-hop artist Maxx accepts an invitation to perform at a music festival in Tehran -- and he receives an extremely warm welcome upon his arrival. But what he doesn't know is that everyone thinks he's a prominent symphony conductor with a similar name. When authorities discover they've invited a rapper to their event, riotous chaos ensues.
link.title: synopsis
Bab'Aziz: The Prince Who Contemplated His Soul
Under the Skin of the City
The Day I Became a Woman
Dress Rehearsal: The Brave Hurr's Ta'Zieh

link.synopsis: A scientist (Dana Medricka) invents a machine that allows her to view a sleeping person's dreams in this wacky 1960s comedy from Czechoslovakia. But when she tries it out on her husband (Jiri Sovak), she discovers he's dreaming about the hot heroine of the comic strip "Who Wants to Kill Jessie?" Worse yet, Jessie (Olga Schoberova) soon comes crashing into their lives for real -- throwing them into a cartoon world of good guys and bad guys.
link.title: synopsis
Good Soldier Schweik 2: Beg to Report, Sir
Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
Where's My Man, To-Nite? / Mystery in Swing
John McLaughlin with Zakir Hussain: Remember Shakti: The Way of Beauty
The End of August at the Hotel Ozone
Jan Svankmajer: The Ossuary and Other Tales
I Served the King of England
Old Believers: Three Films by Jana Sevcikova

link.synopsis: Heavy metal comic Jim Florentine teams up with New York City-based hard-core band Weedkiller in this raucous mix of biting sketch comedy and live musical performances, featuring a number of hard-hitting bands. Conceived by Weedkiller front man Bocko, two skit-filled episodes parody the club scene he's experienced time and again, while metal acts Jesus Knevil, Krust, Purple Pam and Sun Lord deliver live performances in between the laughs.
link.title: synopsis
Meet the Creeps: Outrageous Hidden Camera Comedy

Guy Torry's Phat Comedy Tuesdays: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: Filmed over a two-week period during their U.S. tour in 2004, alternative rock band Pepper blend screwball comedy with live performance in this short film reminiscent of The Beatles pictures of the 1960s. Ducking the cops, evading gangsters and eluding insane groupies, the boys trek across America in search of a mystical, enigmatic figure known as "the Haj." Extras include bonus footage and music videos from the band.

Great Wacky Western Comedies: The Wackiest Wagon Train in the West / Fair Play / The Terror of Tiny Town

link.synopsis: Tre Hardson, Wildchild, Mighty Casey, Oktober Zero, D-Stroy and Grandmaster Caz head the cast in this uproarious urban comedy about six young men who'll do almost anything to become the next hip-hop megastars. It's a wild night as the determined rappers -- competing in one freestyle battle after another -- try to achieve their ambitions, dreaming of superstardom and all the trappings that come with it.
link.title: synopsis
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Atlantic Records: The House that Ahmet Built
I Wish I Had a House Like This
I Think I Love My Wife
Tenacious D in: The Pick of Destiny
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
All the Way: The Kidnapping of a Music Legend

link.synopsis: Successful DJ Sid (Rahul Bose) loves his job and his life. He even loves his girlfriend (Mallika Sherawat) -- but that doesn't mean he wants to marry her. Marriage, Sid believes, is for other people. So how does he end up proposing? A few tears, it turns out, are all it takes to get Sid down on his knees and set the whole nightmare engagement process in motion in this romantic comedy from director Saket Chaudhary.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Misunderstandings abound in this romantic comedy from popular Bollywood director K. Ravi Shankar. Handsome DJ Raj -- a compulsive liar -- thinks there's nothing wrong with telling a fib to help a friend. Soon, however, he finds himself caught in his own twisted web when he pretends to be married so that his best friend might have a chance with the boss's daughter, and then pretends to be a government agent when he has to come up with a wife.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Rob Ackermann, Chris Lilli and the rest of the boys return for another round of drunken antics and outrageous sketch comedy in this raucous film. Setting off on a wild cross-country hunt for the best bars in the United States, the Long Islanders cross paths with porn stars, dancing cowgirls and beer-swilling mountain goats. The cast also includes Adam Szachacz, Tommy Gutter, Peter Hoare and Nick Corrado.
link.title: synopsis
Beer Nutz: The Quest for the Holy Ale
Pauly Shore's Natural Born Komics Sketch Comedy Movie: Miami
American Experience: The Trials of J. Robert Oppenheimer
Hell House: The Book of Samiel
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
Bikini Girls from the Lost Planet
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
Lost Reality 2: More of the Worst

title.regular: Beer: The Movie 2: Leaving Long Island
title.short: Beer: The Movie 2: Leaving Long Island

link.synopsis: In the silent comedy classics collected here, cars explode, cross-dressing villains pursue underwear models and a sexy comedienne chases down her stolen nightie as slapstick provides the rule of the day. Featuring screen appearances by Harold Lloyd, Stan Laurel and Billy West as well as short gems from the likes of Charley Chase, Snub Pollard, Bill Beban and Larry Semon, the collection holds a treasure trove of laughs for fans of early films.
link.title: synopsis
Kings of Comedy: Masters of the Silent Screen
Slapstick Symposium: The Charley Chase Collection 2
Make 'Em Laugh: The Funny Business of America
Saddle Aces / Men of the Plains
The First Kings of Comedy Collection
America's Test Kitchen: Best Entertaining Recipes
Slapstick Symposium: The Oliver Hardy Collection
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection
Laurel & Hardy: Be Big / A Lucky Dog
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2

link.synopsis: Pressured by her parents and swim coach and hassled by a schoolmate, 11-year-old Emma (Sarah Hannemann) wishes she could be anybody but herself -- and soon, she is in this charming German comedy. Emma finds out that wishes can be tricky things, however, when she wakes up one morning not as herself but as her archenemy, Mickey (Nick Seidensticker). Now she's he and he's she, and no one's going to rest until the spell is reversed.
link.title: synopsis
WWE Edge: A Decade of Decadence
The Map of Sex and Love
The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
The Man with One Red Shoe

link.synopsis: When a corrupt detective questions a down-on-his-luck surfer suspected of robbery, he gets a lot more information that he'd bargained for in this madcap Australian crime comedy. Soon, a host of unsavory characters are leading the lieutenant and his cohorts on a wild, monthlong chase through the underbelly of sun-drenched Sydney in a series of interconnected over-the-top crimes. Danny Adcock, Jason Clarke and Blazey Best co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Jeanne Dielman, 23 Quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
I Served the King of England
National Geographic: Inside the Milky Way
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels

link.synopsis: In this Nacho Libre-style comedy, Richard Villa stars as Chencho, a poor boy from Mexico who dreams of marrying the luscious Eloisa (Daniela Melgoza). Eloisa, on the other hand, can think of nothing worse than an arranged marriage with a hick like Chencho and flees to the United States, where a job awaits. The work, however, turns out to be at a strip joint, and Chencho may find himself more to Eloisa's liking when he catches up with her.
link.title: synopsis
El Penalti Mas Largo Del Mundo
Show Business: The Road to Broadway

link.synopsis: Unconventional independent filmmaker Henry Jaglom explores the elusive nature of love in this moving comedy. Director Danny Sapir (played by Jaglom) invites friends and acquaintances who would otherwise be alone to a Valentine's Day party. Circulating among his guests, he asks them for their opinions on relationships, success and loneliness. Sally Kellerman, Andrea Marcovicci, Michael Emil and Orson Welles (in his last film appearance) co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Can She Bake a Cherry Pie?
Eating: A Very Serious Comedy About Women and Food
The Longshot / They Went That-A-Way & That-A-Way
Passport to Europe: Seven Fabulous Cities
I Love You, Don't Touch Me

link.synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Scooter (Peter Billingsley) fakes his own kidnapping with the help of petty criminal Clive (Burt Young) to get the attention of his busy parents. But the pair faces the challenge of their lives when they're kidnapped for real. To rescue their son, Scooter's parents must drop their selfish, philandering ways and discover what success really means. Directed by Jim Sotos, this zany comedy also features Martin Sheen.
link.title: synopsis
Music Scene: The Best of 1969-1970: Vol. 2
WWE: Viva La Raza! The Legacy of Eddie Guerrero
My Best Friend Is a Vampire
Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead

link.synopsis: Monroe High School's class ski trip turns into a snow-covered romp in this campy teen sex comedy helmed by Charles E. Sellier Jr., who transplants the randy teen motif to the scenic slopes of a winter vacation spot. When the students learn that the underhanded resort owner has ripped them off, they hatch a scheme to exact their revenge. The cast includes Mary McDonough, Alan Sues, Jill Carroll and Steven Tash.
link.title: synopsis
Lovers and Lollipops / Weddings and Babies
The Great Bank Hoax / The Great Bank Robbery
Just for the Hell of It / Blast-Off Girls
Severed Ways: The Norse Discovery of America
The Man with One Red Shoe
Who Framed Roger Rabbit?: Special Edition

link.synopsis: Shelley Long, Mel Harris and DeLane Matthews star in this comedy about three longtime friends who revisit the beach resort they spent a carefree vacation at 20 years prior. While the gals may be two decades older, the rest of the island visitors aren't -- and the young, hunky men (including Ian Ziering) aren't averse to romancing their seniors. Risking careers and husbands, the ladies throw caution to the wind and enter the amorous waters.
link.title: synopsis
The Brady Bunch in the White House

link.synopsis: In this Norwegian comedy, a suddenly single mom (who also happens to be pregnant) arms herself with a toy gun and robs a convenience store after her husband drains their savings and runs off with another woman. Not the smartest move, but who can blame her? Subplots abound as urban eccentrics collide in this wickedly funny melodrama co-starring Benedikte Lindbeck, Fares Fares, Kjersti Holmen and Denis Storhoi.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come
Lakki: The Boy Who Could Fly
Dios los Junta y Ellos Se Separan

link.synopsis: Pampered pig Walter and tough-talking spider Tiffany may appear an unlikely pair, but they adore each other. That friendship is tested, however, when Walter begins to spin a web of self-serving lies. When Walter blames a pie's disappearance on UFOs and a bowl's bust-up on a rambunctious ghost, Tiffany must convince her porcine pal that lying doesn't pay or risk losing him as a friend in this charming animated comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Stuart Little: The Animated Series: Fun Around Every Curve!
Mama Mirabelle's Home Movies: Its Movie Time!
Wonder Pets!: Save the Nursery Rhyme!
Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
Little Polar Bear: Lars and the Little Tiger
Kim Possible Movie: So the Drama
Disney Princess Stories: Vol. 1: A Gift From the Heart
Disney Princess Sing-Along Songs: Once Upon a Dream
Hermie & Friends: Webster the Scaredy Spider
The Prince and the Pauper: Double Trouble
Robin Hood: Quest for the King
Alice in Wonderland: What's the Matter with Hatter?
The Three Musketeers: Saving the Crown
The Jungle Book: Rikki-Tikki-Tavi to the Rescue
Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves: The Lost Scimitar of Arabia
Tom and Jerry: Blast Off to Mars
Thomas & Friends: Hero of the Rails
The True Story of Puss 'n Boots
The Hunchback of Notre Dame II

link.synopsis: Two men suffering over the dissolution of their relationships make an unusual pact in this comedy from Argentina. Musician Enrique (Alberto San Juan) will seduce jeweler Javier's (Pere Ponce) ex-wife in order to retrieve some diamonds she still possesses. Meanwhile, Javier will put the moves on Enrique's ex-fiancée to seek revenge for her abandonment. But things don't go as planned, and the mixed-up relationships undergo some unexpected twists.
link.title: synopsis
Word Is Out: Stories of Some of Our Lives
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Nosotros Los Pobres
El Lado Oscuro del Corazon II

title.regular: No Dejare Que No Me Quieras
title.short: No Dejare Que No Me Quieras

link.synopsis: Trouble rears its ugly head at the video arcade in this racy teen comedy about a group of kids who battle businessman and concerned parent Joseph Rutter (Joe Don Baker), who believes that video games will destroy the youngsters' minds. When he tries to close down the popular hangout, it's up to King Vidiot (Jon Gries), nerdy Eugene Groebe (Leif Green) and the rest of the gang to defend their right to play Pac-Man.
link.title: synopsis
Revenge of the Nerds 2: Nerds in Paradise
Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
House Party 4: Down to the Last Minute
Romy and Michele's High School Reunion

link.synopsis: Things heat up for a bride-to-be when she wakes up after her wild Las Vegas bachelorette party and discovers that she's already gone to the chapel and married someone else in this romantic comedy. Determined to correct her mistake, the hung-over bride travels to Cancun, Mexico, with her new man to annul the marriage, but doing the right thing won't be as easy as she thinks. Renee Chatman, "D" Ellis, Troy Degar and Tameka Rodriquez star.
link.title: synopsis
You're Going to Make Me Love Somebody Else
Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right
A Good Man Is Hard to Find
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
I Think I Love My Wife
Soul Theater Series: The Fabric of a Man

link.synopsis: The wildly seductive Pola Negri plays the leader of a band of mountain bandits who falls in love with a lugubrious Bavarian officer in this early slapstick comedy from legendary German director Ernst Lubitsch. Visually stunning and filled with oddball compositions and photographic tricks, the film (shot in Bavaria, where the director liked to winter) is a blunt satire of militarism -- a rarity in post-World War I Germany.
link.title: synopsis
Gaumont Treasures: The Films of Leonce Perret
I Met Him in Paris / Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
The Sheik / The Son of the Sheik
WWE: The History of the Intercontinental Championship
The First Kings of Comedy Collection
The Cheat / Merrily We Go to Hell
The Passion of Joan of Arc
The Oyster Princess / I Don't Want to Be a Man

link.synopsis: Set in the bathhouse where the alien princess Valkyrie crash-landed her spacecraft, the second installment of this anime series continues the wacky adventures of Valkyrie and her human companion, teenager Kazuto Tokino. Highlights of this outlandish comedy include a giant drunken dog, a manga-addicted cyborg, a time warp adventure down memory lane, an enchanted sword that's fallen into the wrong hands and, of course, plenty of lathered skin.
link.title: synopsis
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 5: The Five Bare Aggregates
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 6: The Six Realms Below
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 3: The Three Exposed Jewels
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 1: The Aroused One
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 2: The Two Uncovered Paths
Agent Aika Anime Legends: Re-Mastered Complete Collection
Di Gi Charat: Original TV Series
Tenchi the Movie 2: The Daughter of Darkness

link.synopsis: Although the film is a parody, the action is real in this gangster comedy from Hong Kong directors Gordon Chan and Dante Lam. When small-time goon Fat (Ronald Cheng) loses his memory, he convinces himself he's an undercover cop. In turn, two sexy cops convince him that he must now go after his old boss, Big Bro. But instead of ratting out the kingpin, Fat becomes his ally, as a rival gangster declares a turf war of his own against the big guy.
link.title: synopsis
My Wife Is a Gambling Maestro
Detective Dee and the Mystery of the Phantom Flame
Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen

link.synopsis: A car thief (Rajnikanth) who was kidnapped as a boy to serve as ransom for a priceless sword reunites with his parents as an adult. But after being raised by a criminal, can he turn his life around and walk the straight and narrow? Anitha and Suhasini co-star in this Bollywood blend of comedy, romance and drama, with a little magic thrown in for good measure.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: A respectable Indian family goes to ridiculous lengths to impress the glamorous movie star who's moved in next door, all because she plans to pay them a visit. But when she finally comes to call, her reaction isn't anything like what they expected. Muthuraman, Jayanthi, Nagesh and Showkar Janaki co-star in this farcical Bollywood comedy of modern manners.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Picking the pockets of a stranger gives a clever thief (Wallace Ford) easy access to a bank stuffed with cash, and now he's working on the inside as the bank's manager -- with plans to pull off the heist of a lifetime. Of course, one of his first acts as bank boss is to hire his criminal associates so they can work there as full-time employees and help him plot the robbery. Luana Walters co-stars in this classic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Deanna Durbin: Three Smart Girls / Something in the Wind
The Catherine Cookson Anthology: The Tide of Life
The Premature Burial / The Man with the X-Ray Eyes
They Live by Night / Side Street
No Greater Sin / The Road to Ruin
I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang

link.synopsis: A con man (Roscoe Karns) goes to great lengths to impress his visiting son by "borrowing" a mansion and posing as a successful boxing promoter in this classic comedy. Why the facade? After years of telling lies to his war-hero son (Joseph Allen), "Big Time" Percy Morgan isn't about to start telling the truth: that he's actually a big-time loser. Maxie Rosebloom and Luis Alberni co-star as Morgan's partners in crime.
link.title: synopsis
Detective Kitty O'Day / Private Snuffy Smith / Club Paradise
Dishonored Lady / The Strange Woman: Double Feature
Laurel & Hardy: Air Raid Wardens / Nothing But Trouble
The Three Stooges: Three Smart Saps
The Man Who Came to Dinner
Abbott & Costello: Lost in a Harem / Abbott & Costello in Hollywood

link.synopsis: Forged during the golden era of vaudeville and silent-screen slapstick, comedy duo Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy became one of the few teams to successfully transition to the more rigorous demands of talkies. This vintage collection contains some of the pair's early shorts, including their first screen appearance together in 1921's A Lucky Dog (a collaboration with pioneering producer Mack Sennett) and Yes, Yes, Nanette (1925), directed by Laurel.
link.title: synopsis
Laurel & Hardy: March of the Wooden Soldiers
The Laurel & Hardy Collection: Vol. 2: Alone and Together
Laurel & Hardy: Air Raid Wardens / Nothing But Trouble
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2
Roy Rogers with Dale Evans: Vol. 6
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: In this quirky British comedy, newlyweds Edward (Nick Moran) and Samantha (Keeley Hawes) arrive at their honeymoon hotel, only to find it flooded with undertakers attending their annual convention. The horrified Edward wants to leave immediately, but Samantha convinces him to stay until morning. During the night, however, a prominent mortician is murdered, and the couple quickly gets caught up in the mystery surrounding his bizarre death.
link.title: synopsis
Sherlock Holmes and the Case of the Silk Stocking

link.synopsis: In this airy comedy, budding filmmaker Ibo (Denis Moschitto) dreams of helming a German kung fu flick but first hones his talent with a commercial for his uncle's kebab stand. Ibo's ad -- a martial arts parody featuring dueling shish kebabs -- becomes a huge hit. But things go downhill when his girlfriend turns up pregnant, his family gives him the boot, he gets embroiled in a restaurant feud and … he attracts unwanted attention from the mob.
link.title: synopsis
The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum
Heimat 3: A Chronicle of Beginnings and Endings

link.synopsis: In this screwball comedy, gay soap opera star Cliff (Chris Bruno) plans to marry socialite Cory (Linda Larkin) in order to shore up his reputation as a hunky leading man. Unhappy about Cliff's deep-in-the-closet status, his lover (Jack Koenig) nonetheless agrees to be the best man. But when Cory's maid of honor and her boyfriend arrive, the ever-widening circle of lies makes this trip down the aisle look more like an obstacle course!
link.title: synopsis
The Young, the Gay and the Restless
Eating Out: All You Can Eat
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green

link.synopsis: Director and provocateur David Lynch ("Twin Peaks," Mulholland Drive) doles out his trademark style -- albeit in smaller doses -- with this collection of seven short films that were once available only to members of his personal Web site. Touching on drama, comedy, narrative and horror, the collection also includes experiments with an intervalometer camera, plus a  session with Lynch answering questions from Web site members.
link.title: synopsis
Aspect: The Chronicle of New Media Art: Vol. 7
Savage Sinema from Down Under: Stained
Lynne Sachs: A Collection of Films Exploring Women, Culture, Science & Myth
Lynne Sachs: 10 Short Films and Videos: Vol. 3
Aspect: The Chronicle of New Media Art: Vol. 10
Tebana Sankichi: Snot Rocket and Super Detective
Ripple in the Eye: The Moving Images of Eric Koziol
Fever Dreams and Heavenly Nightmares: The Short Films of Chel White
Tom Verlaine & Jimmy Rip: Music for Experimental Film
Tooth and Nail: Film and Video 1970-74 by Dennis Oppenheim
Aspect: The Chronicle of New Media Art: Vol. 5
Phill Niblock: The Movement of People Working
The Saddest Music in the World
Seducing Time: Selected Prize Winning Videotapes by Lynn Hershman Leeson 1984-2008
Twilight of the Ice Nymphs / Archangel

link.synopsis: After discovering that his mother isn't actually a widow -- and that his real father is serving a jail sentence for a crime he didn't commit -- Ajay Sharma (Ajay Devgan) recruits his roguish friend (Akshay Kumar) to help him round up the corrupt official (Suresh Oberoi) who's responsible. Karisma Kapoor and Aruna Irani co-star in this blend of action and comedy from director Sandesh Kohli.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: It's a case of purposely mistaken identity in this outlandish Bollywood comedy that finds a humble academic pretending to be someone he's not. Botany professor Anant Patil (Ramesh) is hopelessly in love with the beautiful Sulekha (Neetha), so much so that he marries her despite strong objections from her status-conscious brother (Dattatreya). Now, his only hope is to disguise himself as a Kannada-speaking driver. But can he really pull it off?
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this campy comedy teeming with drama queens and soap opera satire, grasping friends and deceitful relatives target rich diva Victoria Gaylord after learning that she has an incurable illness. Unaware that her backstabbing loved ones plan to take over her estate and her fortune, Victoria invites them to share her remaining days. Joe Haggerty, Holly Karrol Clark, Caleb Campbell, Buck Davis and Damien Christopher also star.
link.title: synopsis
The Gay Bed & Breakfast of Terror
First Love and Other Pains / One of Them
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green

title.regular: The Young, the Gay and the Restless
title.short: The Young, the Gay and the Restless

link.synopsis: Love and confusion are the themes in this hilarious Dean Martin double feature combining two raucous romantic comedy romps. In How to Save a Marriage, Dino plays the well-intentioned David, who vows to fix his philandering buddy's (Eli Wallach) marriage -- with riotous results! In Who Was That Lady? real-life couple, Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh team with Martin in a wacky tumble of mixed messages, romance and political espionage.
link.title: synopsis
Suppose They Gave a War and Nobody Came?
A Guide for the Married Man
Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
I Love You, Alice B. Toklas!
Who's Been Sleeping in My Bed?

title.regular: How to Save a Marriage and Ruin Your Life / Who Was That Lady?
title.short: How to Save a Marriage / Who Was That Lady

link.synopsis: Based on screenwriter and film star Priti Chowdhury's life, this comedy tells the story of an Indian-American woman looking for &NFi;preet&NFi_; (a Hindi word for love). Priti (Chowdhury) has achieved success as a physician and restaurant owner, and now she wants a relationship. While her traditional parents set her up with eligible Indian bachelors, her friends convince her to try dating services. But love may be waiting where she least expects it.
link.title: synopsis
Troy's Story: The Legend of Superbike Champion Troy Bayliss
Carlos Mencia: Not for the Easily Offended: Live in San Jose

link.synopsis: Two enemies must work together when they swap bodies in this German take on the hit comedy Freaky Friday. Eleven-year-old Emma (Sarah Hannemann) hates her life; everyone pushes her to excel, and her schoolmate Mickey (Nick Seidensticker) likes to harass her. After wishing she could be a different person, Emma wakes to find herself in Mickey's body. Now, she and Mickey -- who's in her body -- must race against time to reverse the spell.
link.title: synopsis
Missing in Action 2: The Beginning / Missing in Action 3: Braddock
Beresina oder Die letzten Tage der Schweiz
Passport to Europe: Seven Fabulous Cities

link.synopsis: When two very different personalities come together to host a weekly television show, a major feud begins. Egotistical Dan Lake is a seasoned TV journalist long past his prime, and feisty young Ms. Gabby writes a popular Hollywood gossip column. There's a lot of friction on the set of their show "Movie Celebrities." But is it hate -- or love? Rosemary Gore, Peter LaVilla and Trish Matthews star in this zippy romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: When garbage man and struggling artist Arthur (Todd Colby Pliss, who also wrote the script) creates a masterpiece, the whole art world is suddenly after him. Hounded by a money-hungry dealer to create more paintings for her, Arthur quickly finds that living his dream is not all he'd expected it to be. Laced with animated segments, this quirky comedy follows Arthur's journey as he struggles to understand what he truly wants from life.
link.title: synopsis
The Night of the White Pants
The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
Coma Girl: The State of Grace
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog

link.synopsis: Fed up with the typecasting he experiences, young Italian-American actor Johnny Argano (William DeMeo) takes matters into his own hands by writing a screenplay in this charming comedy. Together with his fellow New York actors and buddies Tommy (Daniel Margotta), Mike (James Madio) and Jerome (Tyson Beckford), Johnny embarks on a quest to raise money to make his masterpiece -- and to get his hero, Robert De Niro, to star in it.
link.title: synopsis
World Poker Tour: The Best of Season 3
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
Vince Vaughn's Wild West Comedy Show
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story

link.synopsis: Harkening back to his sketch comedy roots, Damon Wayans presents this updated and slightly more off-color version of his 1990s show "In Living Color" -- even reprising some of the characters from that show. Joining Damon for the pop culture parodies and lowbrow fun are co-stars Will Bowles, Gabrielle Dennis, Josh Flaum, Vincent Oshana and Aries Spears as well as family members son Damon Jr. and brother Dwayne (who provides the music).
link.title: synopsis
Chocolate Sundaes Presents: Live on Sunset Strip!
Popular Mechanics: The New Technology of War
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Prince of Space
Masterpiece Mystery!: Poirot: After the Funeral
Masterpiece Mystery!: Poirot: Taken at the Flood
Masterpiece Mystery!: Poirot: Mystery of the Blue Train
Masterpiece Mystery!: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries: Natural Causes
The Vicar of Dibley: A Holy Wholly Happy Ending
Masterpiece Mystery!: Poirot: Cards on the Table
Physics: The Elegant Universe and Beyond
Galápagos: The Islands That Changed the World
Midsomer Murders: Death in a Chocolate Box
Midsomer Murders: A Picture of Innocence
Family Guy Presents: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
Masterpiece Mystery!: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries: Know Thine Enemy
Masterpiece Mystery!: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries: Limbo
Extras: The Extra Special Series Finale
Masterpiece Mystery!: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries: In the Guise of Death

link.synopsis: A lie balloons to hilarious proportions in this Telugu-language comedy about Anjali (Arti Chabria) and Gopal (Prabhu Deva), two strangers who must pretend to be husband and wife so that they can share an apartment that's only rented to married people. The trouble starts when another man falls for Anjali, mistaking her for a millionaire's daughter; meanwhile, the wife of a rich industrialist thinks her husband's having an affair with Anjali.
link.title: synopsis
Sree Seetha Ramula Kalyanam Chutamu Raarandi

link.synopsis: Three unhappily married men (Rajendra Prasad, Sivaji and Jagapathi Babu) form a suicide pact but instead end up saving a failing businessman also bent on self-destruction in this Bollywood comedy. After hiring the trio, he devises a scheme to get his three free-spirited daughters to accept arranged marriages -- by having his new employees court and then ditch the girls. But complications ensue when the time comes to dump the ladies.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Cyberspace is portrayed as both hero and villain in this sociological comedy about three college grads whose lives are dually enhanced and hindered by their use of instant messaging, email and the Internet as tools of romance. Alex (Kevin Bewersdorf), Tim (director Joe Swanberg) and Chris (C. Mason Wells) try to reconcile real life and virtual reality in this fresh film that combines a script written by its stars with video from everyday people.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In danger of being evicted from a local hostel due to suspicions regarding her profession, a "working girl" (played by Leela Mishra) persuades a handsome stranger (Rajendra Kumar) to pretend to be her husband in this romantic comedy. As the pair jumps through countless hoops to keep up their facade, their fake marriage gives way to some real feelings, and they find themselves falling in love.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: Misunderstandings abound in this frothy comedy of errors in which a groom's honeymoon intentions are continually thwarted by hovering family members. Unable to find any privacy for amorous activities, frustrated newlywed Pratap concocts a scheme to spirit his bride away to a romantic hideaway, where he plans to meet her for a tryst. But when Pratap's father discovers that his son is not sleeping at home, he suspects he's cheating on his new wife.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Three friends from Venice, Calif., learn about personal sacrifice and surviving on the streets of Los Angeles. Romantic barista Isaac (Dustin Nguyen) is smitten with troubled Thaise (Tamlyn Tomita). Slim's (Darion Bosco) Rastafarian culture won't save him from local gangsters, and Troy (Garrett Wang) is an actor on the verge of his big Hollywood break. Eric Koyanagi makes his feature directorial debut with this triple-character comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Genghis Khan: To the Ends of the Earth and Sea
Kavanagh Q.C.: Nothing But the Truth
Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire
I Love You, Don't Touch Me

link.synopsis: Class clown Janet (Adah Glassbourg) keeps her friends in stitches by making fun of herself, particularly her hefty weight. Eventually convinced that she may have what it takes to become a professional comedian, Janet tests out her talent at the local comedy club. Enter struggling comedian Tony Moroni (Jim Carrey), who helps Janet regain her self-esteem while she, in turn, helps Tony improve his poor joke-writing skills.
link.title: synopsis
Comic Relief: The Greatest... And the Latest
To Be or Not To Be
Monty Python's And Now for Something Completely Different

link.synopsis: One evening, while drowning his sorrow at the local bar, 65-year-old postman Sol confides to bartender Nicky (Mike Marino) his plans to rob the local post office of its cache of valuable stamps. When Sol drops dead, Nicky decides to carry out Sol's caper and put an end to his own financial misery. Jim Norton co-stars as Nicky's best friend, Paul, in this comedy about bumbling crooks and their hilarious misfortune from director Paul Battista.
link.title: synopsis
Meet the Creeps: Outrageous Hidden Camera Comedy
Riding on Air / When's Your Birthday?
Shaw Martial Arts Legends: Guns of Master Killer / Raiders of Buddhist Kung-Fu
Full Bottom: Not Another Half-Arsed Release
The Three Stooges: Lost Comedy Treasures
National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation 2: Cousin Eddie's Island Adventure
The Three Stooges: Kings of Laughter
Shemp Cocktail: A Toast to the Original Stooge
Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son

link.synopsis: Zany characters La Chupitos and La Chabelita are part and parcel of the chaotic, hilarious world in this house of laughter, a south-of-the-border sketch comedy series conceived and produced by Jorge Ortiz de Pinedo, with help from such comic luminaries as Liliana Arriaga, Nora Velazquez and Jorge Falcon. Laugh along with the irreverent and outrageous antics of a large ensemble cast from one of Mexico's highest-rated television series.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: A horde of money-hungry characters search for a valuable bag of diamonds in this madcap Bollywood comedy. An underworld don (Jackie Shroff) has gone bankrupt -- but his moll (Celina Jaitley) possesses the bag of jewels that could reverse his fortunes. Meanwhile, a con man (Ritesh Deshmukh), a mechanic (Shreyas Talpade), a cop (Sunil Shetty), a dancer (Koena Mitra) and several others get caught up in a greedy quest for the diamonds.
link.title: synopsis
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year

link.synopsis: The Koledowa family enjoys a quiet, happy life in the Polish countryside -- that is, until Mrs. Koledowa's unmarried daughter turns up pregnant one day and the news triggers a scandal that rocks the family's social standing in the village. Luckily, the matriarch has a plan to get her family out of this mess. This charming domestic comedy directed by Roman Zaluski stars Bozena Dykiel (of The Decalogue) and Krzysztof Kowalewski.
link.title: synopsis
Prehistoric America: A Journey Through the Ice Age and Beyond
A Year of the Quiet Sun
Between the Cup and the Lip
On the Banks of the Niemen

link.synopsis: To escape the relentless hectoring of his domineering wife (Amparo Rivelles), quiet taxidermist Pablo Morales (Arturo de Cordova) finds comfort with his prized stuffed animals. When Pablo's spouse conveniently vanishes, however, he explains it away by saying she's "on vacation" -- touching off suspicions by the police. Elda Peralta also stars in this timeless black comedy from director Rogelio A. Gonzalez.
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: A Toda Maquina
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Los Tres Garcia
Coleccion Pedro Infante: ¿Que Te Ha Dado Esa Mujer?
What Did You Do in the War, Daddy?
Mission of the Shark: The Saga of the U.S.S. Indianapolis
Jeanne Dielman, 23 Quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Arriba las Mujeres

link.synopsis: In search of a divorce attorney, high-powered project engineer Sayeh (Mahnaz Afshar) winds up in a psychiatrist's office, where she recounts the stormy fights she's had with her spoiled contractor husband (Mohammad Reza Golzar). Before long, the shrink has the bickering couple investigating their inner children. Director Tahmineh Milani tackles gender inequalities in Iran with a humorous touch in this romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
A Few Kilos of Dates for a Funeral
No One Knows About Persian Cats
Under the Skin of the City
Smell of Camphor, Fragrance of Jasmine

link.synopsis: Sao Paulo pawnshop owner Lourenco (Selton Mello) takes perverse pleasure in buying the desperate locals' used items. Lourenco believes people are no different than his inventory -- objects to be categorized. But when he's disturbed by a malodorous toilet and forced to relate to people, the shop proprietor begins to crumble. Brazilian director Heitor Dhalia helms this dark comedy, a Grand Jury Prize Nominee at the 2007 Sundance Film Festival.
link.title: synopsis
Once Upon a Time in Rio
Blood and Wine: A Brazilian Story
Love for Sale: Suely in the Sky
The Year My Parents Went on Vacation
The Other Side of the Street
To the Left of the Father
How Tasty Was My Little Frenchman
Coffin Joe: At Midnight I'll Take Your Soul
Coffin Joe: Awakening of the Beast

link.synopsis: In this overlooked 1930s screwball comedy, Charles Starrett stars as Reginald Jones, an economics professor who gets fired after he fails the daughter of one of the school's biggest contributors, Mr. Corning (Guy Usher). Out on his own, Jones puts his economic theories to work and panhandles his way to wealth. The plot twists pile up as Corning uses every trick in the book to spoil Jones's cuckoo quest for millions.
link.title: synopsis
My Sister Eileen / She Wouldn't Say Yes
What Did You Do in the War, Daddy?
If You Could Only Cook / Too Many Husbands
Deanna Durbin: Three Smart Girls / Something in the Wind
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: It's a Gift
The Doctor Takes a Wife / A Night to Remember

link.synopsis: The strongest sailor in the Navy, Husky Stone (Ray Mayer) starts hunting for a wife and finds a game prospect in the form of dizzy blonde Myrtle Montrose (Isabel Jewell). But Husky's wisecracking buddy Pete Kelly (Wallace Ford) is also sweet on Myrtle, and a stormy rivalry ensues in this free-spirited comedy. The high jinks culminate with Husky stranded on a ship slated for bombing practice, and Pete must leap to the rescue.
link.title: synopsis
The Mummy's Hand / The Mummy's Tomb
Charlie Chan at Monte Carlo / Behind That Curtain
Val Lewton: The Seventh Victim / Shadows in the Dark: The Val Lewton Legacy
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: You Can't Cheat an Honest Man
The Three Stooges: Three Stooges in History
Will Rogers Collection: Life Begins at Forty
Will Rogers Collection: In Old Kentucky
Milky Way / Kid Dynamite: Double Feature
The Three Stooges: Cops and Robbers
Great Wacky Western Comedies: The Wackiest Wagon Train in the West / Fair Play / The Terror of Tiny Town
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: International House

link.synopsis: Innocent young music student Sherry Williams (Jane Powell, in her second starring role) dreams of following in the footsteps of her older sister Josephine (Constance Moore), a big Broadway star. But when Sherry arrives in the Big Apple, she learns that her sis is actually a burlesque stripper. Sherry tries to make things right by setting up Josephine with a hotshot Broadway producer (Ralph Bellamy) in this frothy musical comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Deanna Durbin: Lady on a Train
Thank You, Jeeves / Step Lively, Jeeves!
The Judy Garland Show: Featuring Ray Bolger and Vic Damone
Juke Joint / Reet, Petite and Gone

link.synopsis: Jeff (Mantan Moreland) and Frankie (Frankie Darro) take a leisurely approach to their work at the Carlton Arms Hotel. That is, until they witness a mob slaying of a professional gambler in the hotel's garage. The detectives are stumped and enlist our bumbling duo as undercover sleuths. And the deeper they dig, the more danger they encounter. The crime comedy is one of eight films starring the Moreland and Darro team.
link.title: synopsis
Gasoline Alley / As You Were / Mr. Walkie Talkie
Heroes for Sale / Wild Boys of the Road
If You Could Only Cook / Too Many Husbands
Monsieur Beaucaire / Where There's Life: Double Feature
Chamber of Horrors / The Brides of Fu Manchu
Sgt. Bilko: The Phil Silvers Show: Season 1
Love Train: The Sound of Philadelphia: Live in Concert
Deanna Durbin: Lady on a Train
Anything for a Thrill / Men of Action

link.synopsis: Frugal and responsible mail carrier Leo (Howard Montaque) is happily saving for a rainy day. That is, until he has to help his brother Donald pay off a big gambling debt to the mob. When the two cook up a scheme to raise funds by entering average-guy Leo in a bodybuilding competition, all bets are off and the laughs are on. Director Freddie Robinson Jr.'s muscle-man comedy romp premiered at the Fort Lauderdale International Film Festival.
link.title: synopsis
Elite XC: Primetime: Kimbo vs. Colossus
The Maltese Falcon / Satan Met a Lady
A Good Day to Be Black & Sexy

link.synopsis: It's hilarious claymation catastrophe in director Roy T. Wood's animated send-up of blockbuster sci-fi disaster films. Can vulcanologist Harry Bottoms and his motley crew of disaster experts find a way to eliminate the impending doom of a killer planetoid threatening the citizens of Earth? Rockers Tommy Lee, Mick Mars, Vince Neil and Nikki Sixx lend their voices to clay counterparts in this comedy from the creators of MTV's "Celebrity Deathmatch."
link.title: synopsis
The Edgar Allan Poe Collection: Vol. 1: Annabel Lee & Other Tales of Mystery and Imagination
The Drawn Together Movie: The Movie!
Marshal of Gunsmoke / Oklahoma Raiders / Arizona Days / Trouble in Texas
Aoi and Mutsuki: A Pair of Queens
Scourge of Worlds: A Dungeons and Dragons Adventure
Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
National Lampoon Presents Jake's Booty Call
Liquid Tales: The Animated Films of Patrick Smith
The Best of Zagreb Film: Laugh at Your Own Risk & For Children Only

link.synopsis: Intrigue and romance blend with old-fashioned classic comedy in this Bollywood caper following the high jinks of two mismatched protagonists (Kishore Kumar and Bhagwan, who also directs) who bungle their way into finding a mysterious black coat that's rumored to be stuffed with money. Featuring music by O.P. Nayyar, the film co-stars Shashikala, Smriti Biswas, Badri Prasad, Baburao Pendharkar, Vasantrao and Mirajkar in the supporting cast.
link.title: synopsis
Duets of Asha with Rafi & Kishore
One Shocking Moment / The Abnormal Female / Maidens of Fetish Street
Jis Desh Men Ganga Behti Hai

link.synopsis: The free-spirited Marta (Italian beauty Claudia Cardinale) moves to the big city and gets a job as a telephone operator. She and her pal Nanda (Catherine Spaak) are both looking for love -- only Marta prefers the less permanent variety. Soon, she starts using the switchboard as a means of finding men. And before long, Marta and Nanda are making love connections with rich, lonely fellows all across Europe in this charming romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Loves and Times of Scaramouche
Once Upon a Time in the West
Dr. Goldfoot and the Girl Bombs

link.synopsis: European screen royalty Catherine Deneuve and Anita Ekberg star in this sexy episodic comedy about a psychiatrist who wants to learn why so many women report difficulties in achieving sexual satisfaction. Deneuve plays Angela, a bored housewife who fakes sleepwalking every night so she can visit a neighbor across the street. Ekberg is the unsubtly named Lolita, who charms her shy neighbor Peter (famed Austrian entertainer Peter Alexander).
link.title: synopsis
In the Realm of the Senses
Day of the Nightmare / Scream of the Butterfly: Double Feature
Twilight of the Ice Nymphs / Archangel
Sissi: The Fateful Years of the Empress
Sleeping Beauty: Classic Motion Picture with the Kirov Ballet
The End of August at the Hotel Ozone

link.synopsis: Gypsy coffee vendor Michele (popular Italian leading man Nino Manfredi) illegally hawks espresso aboard a train in an effort to raise money for his sick son. In each compartment he visits, Michele cooks up a new identity -- a war hero or a concert pianist, for instance -- to connect with his customers. But with conductors, police and other officials eager to stop Michele's antics, our hero must think and move fast in this light Italian comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Assassination in Rome / Espionage in Tangiers
Padre Pio: Between Heaven and Earth
Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man
The Virgo, The Taurus and The Capricorn
The Giallo Collection: Who Saw Her Die?
The Night of the Shooting Stars

link.synopsis: Marking Corey Feldman's directorial debut, this comedy centers on a group of unconventional police officers in a quiet summer resort town who have turned their jail into a bordello. When the town mayor hires Capt. Mary Mae (Mariana Morgan) as the new top cop, she's determined to restore law and order. Feldman's frequent acting partner Corey Haim co-stars, and Elliott Gould, Todd Bridges, Julie Strain and Ron Jeremy make cameo appearances.
link.title: synopsis
The Triple B Collection: Enemy Gold
The Triple B Collection: Fit to Kill
South Beach Academy / Rock 'n' Roll High School Forever
South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut
Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me

link.synopsis: Counterculture auteur Jon Moritsugu takes potshots at the San Francisco Bay Area underground rock community in this award-winning deadpan comedy. Wannabe filmmaker Miles (Kyp Malone) and aging rocker Roxxy (Amy Davis) are on the verge of becoming has-beens but refuse to give up the ghost without a good dose of public histrionics. Moritsugu's use of analog rather than digital media lends a gritty edge to his terrifically trashy satire.
link.title: synopsis
The Documentaries of Louis Malle: Vive Le Tour / Humain, Trop Humain / Place de la Republique
Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
Crazy Richard & I Can't Even Think Straight
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story

title.regular: Scumrock: It's Scumrock, Not Punk Rock!
title.short: Scumrock: It's Scumrock, Not Punk Rock!

link.synopsis: British photographer George Harrison Marks stars as himself (and his ancestors) in this hilarious comedy. Using a visit to a psychiatrist as a modern framing device, Marks travels through time to chronicle the ills his lecherous progenitors suffered because of their entanglements with -- what else? -- ladies and the arts. Featuring a bevy of nude beauties including June Palmer, Sue Bond and Monique Devereaux, the film was considered racy in 1969.
link.title: synopsis
The Happy Hooker Goes to Washington / The Happy Hooker Goes Hollywood
Schoolgirl Report: Vol. 1: What Parents Don't Think Is Possible
The Beast that Killed Women/ The Monster of Camp Sunshine
Hey! There's Naked Bodies on My TV!
The Knack...and How to Get It
Those Daring Young Men in Their Jaunty Jalopies
The Wrong Arm of the Law
The Pure Hell of St. Trinian's
The File of the Golden Goose

link.synopsis: A night of passion during a Greek vacation blossoms into a May-December romance in this 1973 comedy. When 22-year-old lothario Peter Latham (Edward Albert) turns up months later in New York City, his middle-aged paramour, Ann Stanley (Liv Ullmann, whose performance netted a Golden Globe nod), must decide whether to listen to her head or follow her heart. The supporting cast includes Deborah Raffin and Gene Kelly (as Ann's ex-husband).
link.title: synopsis

category.term: Best Actress in a Motion Picture (Musical or Comedy) nominee

link.title: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
You Can't Take It with You

link.synopsis: After finding the titular bundle on the steps of a foundling home, Polly Parish (Debbie Reynolds) can't convince anybody -- least of all her employer (Adolphe Menjou) or his handsome son (Eddie Fisher) -- that's she not the child's mother. Una Merkel and Nita Talbot provide first-rate support in director Norman Taurog's breezy musical remake of the Ginger Rogers-David Niven comedy Bachelor Mother (1939).
link.title: synopsis

link.title: The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Vol. 1
